lead_paragraph: Former captives of the group told of being raped, many repeatedly, in what officials described as a deliberate strategy to possibly create a new generation of Islamist militants.

headline.print_headline: Former Captives in Nigeria Tell of Mass Rapes
headline.main: Boko Haram Militants Raped Hundreds of Female Captives in Nigeria

snippet: Former captives of the group told of being raped, many repeatedly, in what officials described as a deliberate strategy to possibly create a new generation of Islamist militants.
abstract: Interviews with newly freed women and girls who were captives of Boko Haram in rural Nigeria detail brutal accounts of rape, often repeatedly; officials say that organized sexual violence is part of deliberate strategy to control rural residents, particularly women, with possible goal of impregnating them to create new generation of Islamist militants.
